name: Ponkle
description: Ponkle is a 2D jump action game. Operation of this game is very simple with mouse click only, and the stage is randomly generated.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP or later Processor: 1.0 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7 series or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
